genresAdvancedInfo.name: cimbalom
genresAdvancedInfo.description: Cimbalom is a genre of music that features the cimbalom, a hammered dulcimer-like instrument that originated in Hungary. The music is characterized by its rich, complex harmonies and intricate rhythms, and often features traditional Hungarian folk melodies. Cimbalom music has been influential in classical and contemporary music, and is still popular in Hungary and other parts of Europe.
